properties.Name: PolicySpecialSituation
properties.Description:
There may be special situations that the Insurer address with regard to the payment of policy proceeds.

These may include:

-  the simultaneous deaths of the insured and the beneficiary

-  preventing proceeds attached by creditors

-  situations in which insurers can pay proceeds to non-designated beneficiaries

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: SpecialSituationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Special Situation.

Columns.Name: SpecialSituationDateDefined
Columns.Description: The date that the Special Situation was defined for the Policy.

Columns.Name: SpecialSituationDateApplied
Columns.Description: The date that the Special Situation was applied to the Policy.

Columns.Name: SpecialSituationResolution
Columns.Description: The resolution of the Special Situation for the associated Policy.

Columns.Name: SpecialSituationNote
Columns.Description: Comments, notes are additional information regarding the special situations applied to the policy.

-  situations in which insurers can pay proceeds to non-designated beneficiaries
